content: 2½ hour nap madunaier mad cap fancies ok yeah i am a fast crocheter and the first time through it may take you a bit longer but once you learn it you can whip this up in 2 ½ hours while baby s taking a long nap… 2½ hour nap madunaier mad cap fancies materials crochet hook in size j 6 00mm one ¾ button sewing needle and thread yarn 300 yards worsted weight yarn gauge 3 shells = 4 5 finished size chest size = 20 for smaller sizes use thinner yarn and smaller hook abbreviations chain = chain stitch st = stitch repeat = repeat sl-st = slip_stitch skip = skip single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet chain-space = chain space tch = turning chain at start of prev row 2½ hour nap may 24 2016 -version 3 - page 2 of 6 directions yoke shell = 5dc shell7 = 7dc half-shell at start of row = ch3 turn work 2 double_crochet in 1st single_crochet half-shell at end of row = 3dc in last single_crochet increase-over-shell7 = skip 1st double_crochet single_crochet in 2nd double_crochet skip 3rd double_crochet work 5dc shell in 4th double_crochet skip 5th double_crochet single_crochet in 6th double_crochet skip 7th double_crochet single_crochet-in-shell = single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet of 5dc shell chain 50 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across 49 single_crochet row 2 half-shell in 1st single_crochet skip 2nd single_crochet single_crochet in 3rd single_crochet skip 4th single_crochet shell in 5th single_crochet skip 6th single_crochet single_crochet in 7th single_crochet skip 8th single_crochet for the first front shell7 in 9th single_crochet skip 10th single_crochet single_crochet in 11th single_crochet skip 12th single_crochet shell in 13th single_crochet skip 14th single_crochet single_crochet in 15th single_crochet skip 16th single_crochet shell7 in 17th single_crochet for the first sleeve skip 18th single_crochet single_crochet in 19th single_crochet skip 20th single_crochet shell in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet 3 times for the back shell7 in 33rd single_crochet skip 34th single_crochet single_crochet in 35th single_crochet skip 36th single_crochet shell in 37th single_crochet skip 38th single_crochet single_crochet in 39th single_crochet skip 40th single_crochet shell7 in 41st single_crochet for the other sleeve skip 42nd single_crochet single_crochet in 43rd single_crochet skip 44th single_crochet shell in 45th single_crochet skip 46th single_crochet single_crochet in 47th single_crochet skip 48th single_crochet half-shell in last single_crochet for the other front after working row 2 you should have 4 shell7s 7 shells 2 half- shells 2½ hour nap may 24 2016 -version 3 - page 3 of 6 place a marker in center of each of the 4 shell7s and after each row of the yoke move the markers up to the same place in the new row row 3 increase row ch1 turn single_crochet in 1st double_crochet work a shell in each single_crochet single_crochet in each shell increase-over-shell7 in each of the shell7s ending row with single_crochet in tch 16 shells row 4 half-shell single_crochet in shell shell in single_crochet across row
